resources.string: Check out the latest movies out there sitting in your home
Book movie tickets for your family and friends!
Enjoy the luxury of getting to know all about movies absolutely free!!
Enjoy the movies of every place at any time
To see the welcome slider again, goto Settings -> apps -> welcome slider -> clear data
Now see the great movies you will love and you can select them all here.
Check out the rating,release date and other details about the movies you want to watch from this library which gives you free access to all of these informations.Enjoy!
So, Select the movies,call your friends and have an awesome movie night!
